name: 2025 15th International Conference on Bioscience, Biochemistry and Bioinformatics
content: Publication and Indexing: ICBBB 2025 conference proceedings in BIO Web of Conferences (Open Access proceedings in Biology, Life Sciences and Health, eISSN: 2117-4458), which is now indexed by Scopus, CPCI (Web of Science), DOAJ, Google Scholar, etc. Papers of ICBBB have been published in Conference Proceedings, indexed by Ei Compendex and Scopus for 8 years.
